title: Jaki Byard, A Post-Bebop Pianist Who Was A Master Of Stride Piano
teaser: On The Late Show, a set of previously unheard solo music from 1979, the jazz pianist employs techniques like suspenseful dropouts. He had a rare ability to sound archaic â€” and way ahead of his time.
